attributes.action: bring back the death penalty for all PROVEN sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the prime minister to bring back the death penalty for sex offenders, as a mum to two young girls i was disgusted to find the fact that 1 in 3 girls will be victims, and 1 in 6 boys. thats to high a number when you want your children to be able to walk the streets safely.By bringing the death penalty back hopefully the offenders will think more carefully before doing it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
